title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Strategize your cash flow for your success. Surprisingly, youre willing to create more structure for managing your money now, even if it means tightening your belt. Perhaps youre inclined to spend less, streamline your necessities, or become stricter with your current budget. However, the key value of sobering Saturn transiting through your 2nd House of Accountability is that you learn to use your resources more effectively. Otherwise, you can overly indulge your impulses and leave yourself too vulnerable to a crisis-oriented mindset. Benjamin Franklin wrote, If you fail to plan, you plan to fail. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
